Like the Shepard, I will also be redoing this one in the spaceplane hangar.

The *Yamato Space Battleship*, if you have not seen it on the internet, is a flying (both in air and in space) boat, submarine, and plane.

> ![yamato1ship1k.png](http://img853.imageshack.us/img853/4596/yamato1ship1k.png)

Off to work!
You totally need to make a video of this.

Agreed. Vid please. It needs some dramatic japenese animae music with close up camera shots of that beast taking off. You know the type. The close up looking down the hull shots. The middle distance shot of the camera being engulfed with smoke. Fade to the orbital shots with lasers firing in every direction. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Bonus points if you can get a Klingon to cameo. ;P
